name: Top Smither 0.5
description:
Forge. Upgrade. Forge. Upgrade. Forge. 

Forge nails, buy upgrades to forge more nails, buy even more upgrades to forge even more nails. 

Explore your workshed to discover interactables to enhance your nail forging journey. From drinking coffee and listening to the radio - to reading a book and going to sleep. Don't just play Top Smither, experience Top Smither.
